name: Filter / effects
description:
A powerful Filter breaks into your workflow!

There are currently more than 50 customizable effects available.


How to use it:

– Select one image or node (depends on the Select fill-image only setting).

– Apply effects.

– Save Image!


— The plugin allows you to edit the applied effects. To do this, you need to apply it to the original fill-image or node.

— The plugin allows you to work with the image of a node (including a slice). To do this, disable the Select fill-image only parameter.

Premium features


1. A spacious interface with a large preview (activated on the Settings page).

2. Additional effects:

- Gradient Map.

- Lavels.

- Posterization.

3. Preview switching interface (in the advanced interface), which allows displaying a map of the effect distribution over the image when using correction zones.


Get key: Gumroad or VK Donut.
